name: Anim, Games & Interactivity 1 Folio 1 - House Chores
name_original: Anim, Games & Interactivity 1 Folio 1 - House Chores
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • E to interact
  • RMB (Right Mouse Button) to drop
  • Left Ctrl/Command to crouch
  • RMB to zoom in
  • Esc to Pause
  • L Shift to run

If playing on the browser, please play this game in full screen as the mouse is buggy when not in full screen for some reason.

And press escape twice to bring back the mouse cursor.

Edit: Added Mac build. Couldn't test it myself but do let me know if it works or not
